name: NewYorker
text: "In the beginning, it was like a dark storm, the sort you can hear even before you see the clouds roll in. Eventually, the clouds were all we could see." https://t.co/gxvGVHVuoJ

name: NewYorker
text: Hear Toni Morrison talk about the media industry, her childhood, and her relationship with her family, from an interview in 2015. Listen here, or wherever you get your podcasts. https://t.co/W9OLWG81JU
